name: Jeff K
text:
Awesome food and a giant drink menu full of the good stuff.
Had the steak and cheese calzone and the pretzel bites. If I could order a glass of the pabst cheese sauce I'd drink it.

name: Bethanie Parshall
text: Jackson was very attentive, friendly and a great server to my boyfriend and I. Very impressed with the service, I'd be surprised if he wasn't a manager.. if not, he needs promoted. He's got a great attitude and made sure we had exactly ‚Ä¶More

name: Chase Fleeup
text: Really enjoyed the ambiance here and the food was amazing. Went with an all meat pizza and original crust, definitely plan to make the drive for more pizza. The waiter and manager were both really nice, we met a manager as they thought they over cooked our pizza and offered to cook us another but it was perfect as it was.

name: TN Resident
text: Gone from a 4 to a 5 for me. Really like this place.  I drive in from TN because I like this location better than the ones in Nashville.  I highly recommend anything with their beer cheese sauce. They went from a 4 to a 5 star when I ‚Ä¶More

name: jessica krukowski
text:
Were visiting bowling Green and was dreary and raining most of it. So after a few cave tours, needed some good food to veg out in hotel with.
THIS pizza was awesome! As were the garlic bread and pretzel bites. Best we've had in long time! (Not any good pizza where we live).

name: Casi Finstad
text: Great food, atmosphere, and patio. Food was a little slow, but otherwise a great experience

name: Paulette Clardy
text: The pizzas rank right up there at the top for best in town!! üçïüçïüçï The ingredients are fresh, lots of choices for build-your-own! The crust is perfection! You will not leave any on your plate ----- Not soggy, not dry, not tough....... and, ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Horne
text: Wasn't very crowded   we were seated in the bar area  after a few minutes we placed our order.   Got our drinks and our waiter ( the bartender) never came to check on us until we stopped him to find out how much longer it would be till our ‚Ä¶More

name: rj painting Home Improvement
text: We were looking for a place to eat in bowling green and found the mellow mushroom. Pizza was delicious, with lots of toppings. They also had gluten free crust and dairy free cheese. Had a salad with some nice greens, and their beer selection is large. We will be back if were in town again

name: Candy Rocha
text: We love Mellow Mushroom chain. However, we have always been able to bring our little dog as long as we sit on the patio. This Mellow Mushroom doesn't allow dogs even on the patio. So we had to go to another restaurant. ‚òπÔ∏è So I guess Mellow Mushroom is out when we visit Bowling Green, KY

name: John Sims
text: Yummy pizza and a wide selection of local brews. The New Holland Dragon's Milk went really well with the House Special.

name: Victoria Dugger
text:
The pizza here is always good. They are also doing a great job to comply with Corona Virus Guidelines. We were separated by multiple tables, and there were multiple signs stating you must have a mask to enter. All the staff wore masks.
Great job!

name: Sydney Kaercher
text: Their food is always so good and our server, Ryelee, was attentive and delightful. I got the chef salad with added chicken this time (and brought my own light Caesar dressing, which they didn‚Äôt judge me for.) Hubs got the house ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Logsdon
text: Great food and great drink menu. Love the draft beer selection this place offers. They have something for everyone. Great place to grab a slice or just get a drink. They have live music from time to time. Recommend everyone try it at least once.

name: Denetria Twitty
text: Loved it. First time here got the house pizza,  thai chili wings and pretzel bites. Delicious.

name: Ashley Bartley
text: Their food is always amazing! But to be honest, I go for the pretzels and beer cheese. It's so addicting!

name: Jessica O
text: Delicious food and super nice staff. Loved the friendly atmosphere.

name: G P
text: GREAT FOOD, Vibrant Atmosphere, Waitress was on her Game, Drinks were NEVER Empty, and the Restaurant was Clean & Neat! Just an ALL AROUND GREAT PLACE TO ENJOY A MEAL!!!üòã

name: Joel Chapman
text:
I always love this chain and this establishment is no exception. Wonderful pizza and great appetizers. They have delightful staff that takes care of you every time you come in and the atmosphere is perfect for family dinners.
Mellow Mushroom also has great lunch options.

name: donna wiley
text: It was awesome. Nice atmosphere and the staff was very nice. The food did not disappoint. Everything we ordered was so delicious. One of my favorite places to eat üòç

name: jeniontherocks
text: I can‚Äôt say enough about how good the pizza is here!  They also have several other good menu items, their salads are amazing!  We love going on trivia night and playing as a family and many nights they have live music.  It‚Äôs also great to get it to go...the food is always quality!

name: Karen Powers
text: Tasty pizza with friendly service. I felt comfortable dining on my own. Thank you Justin!

name: sherry logan
text: Delicious food. Awesome service. Great dinning experience

name: Poptographix
text: Amazing food and great atmosphere. A lot of good music. And service was amazing our server Donna was very nice and helpful. Would definitely come back if in town.

name: Cherie Stewart
text: It was great.  We sat outside, the food was great.

name: Jim Shannon
text: I have yet to have a bad experience at ANY Mellow Mushroom.....and this one did not disappoint either.  GREAT FOOD!!!  GREAT SERVICE!!!

name: Kim Ann
text: Best pizza ever! Adorable place and awesome service!

name: Cheri TerHaar
text: Great food. Good service. Pleasant indoor and outdoor seating options.

name: Joy Foster
text: They seated us quickly,  but it took about 15minutes for someone to let us know that it would take about another hour or so for us to get food.  So we left.

name: Karen M
text: I have yet to go, but the choices I've seen, i am extremely impressed AND the reviews on cleanliness. I can hardly wait!

name: Frank HALLING
text: Pretzels n Wings were good. Great beer selection.

name: Kevin Jarchow
text: Very good pizza. Nice atmosphere.

name: Raquel Alvarado
text: Service was VERY slow...we wanted pizza BUT after we sat down they inform us that it would take about 45minutes to get your pizza!! We settled for wings and hummus AND that took just as long!

name: Yvonne Price
text: We had to have many pizzas, calzones and salads in a short amount of time and Mellow Mushroom stepped up and made it happen. The pizzas were mostly special order, including gluten free, and were perfectly made and delicious. The calzones are huge!! And were equally as tasty. Thanks for making our difficult project easy.

name: Sarah Orellana
text: Second time going. Again it was delicious pizza! I am vegan and their vegan pizza is so yummy!! Hit my craving perfectly!! The inside is kinda a cross between sports bar and a hippie spot. Very relaxed and the staff was very friendly and prompt.

name: hayammayyy *
text: The food was SO good! Super friendly staff :)

name: Redstone Retreat
text: Half full, terrible service.  Food took an hour to get to us. Don‚Äôt care how good it is won‚Äôt be coming back. After being quarantine so long make sure you have good service.

name: Durchlochert
text: The service was great, watching the people toss the dough and stretch was rrally entertaining.  The Holy Shitake I got was amazing!

name: Michael Ratigan
text: The pizza is out of this world!!! The prices are mid-range!!! We had a great time!!! We had a coupon for a free large specialty, so we got the mellow meaty with onions!!!

name: Laura Crosley
text: Was in town for work and decided to stop by for dinner. The Great White pizza was probably one of the best pizzas I‚Äôve ever had. Absolutely worth going in to grab some food if you‚Äôre debating on where to go

name: DeAnna Myers
text: This location is great usually. We've been here several times and really enjoyed it. If you hit prime time for dinner, goodluck finding a parking spot and expect to be waiting around for a while. It's a popular place.

name: Austin Riley
text: Great pizza, beer, and awesome interior. Eat there

name: DM FU
text: Awesome atmosphere, great food, great staff! Joey (waiter) took excellent care of us.

name: FriedChicken
text: Second time to visit. New menu. Good pizza good atmosphere. Friendly staff

name: Fergy Ferg
text: Great atmosphere, food. And drink selection.

name: Jason Belgard
text: Great food n well priced.

name: Edward Blunt
text: This location of the Mellow Mushroom was pretty cool. It has a really cool atmosphere that you come to expect of the Mellow Mushroom. If you haven't been to one before, its got a hippie vibe to the decor. We stopped here on our way back ‚Ä¶More

name: Jane Lenk
text: Excelent and juicy burger, service good, highly recomendable.

name: Frank Smith
text:
Service; quick and knowledge.
Food; hot, fresh, and good quality.
Beer; excellent variety, cold, and fair prices.

name: Kelly Slow
text: Great food.  They can satisfy vegan tastes too.  They have some hard to find beer that isn't out of date which is kind of rare.

name: Korey Pryer
text: Mellow Mushroom always has great beers and great food. A Bowling Green favorite.

name: Jessica C
text: The food was amazing...first time eating there.

name: Logan Stewart
text: Pizza and service is pretty good.

name: Brian Scimeca
text: Let's all face it.... It's hard to find a good pizzaria down south.  But this place got it right. Great dough and crispy crust!

name: Carol Womack
text: Service was very, very slow but food was good.

name: Phillip Woosley
text: Terrific food! Wonderful service

name: Maria Oliveroz
text: Great service, great food, and great beer!!

name: Elizabeth Rosemarie
text: All hype but no follow through. Passing through town and thought it sounded fun. Neat decor but thats all.  Food was a veey long wait and it tasted so bad that I left this at the table.  They didn't even ask why I ate 1/2 of one piece of ‚Ä¶More

name: Chad Philpott
text: Good pizza, Holy Shitake was good. Kinda pricey.

name: Tiffany Smith
text: Just came here with family while on a trip. The food was great, and the service was even better. All the employees were super friendly and helpful. Our server, Riley, was amazing! So energetic and kind and took great care of us!

name: Adam Logsdon
text: It took forever to get our food the food was cold

name: Kevin Daniels
text: Look at my Veggie Pizza. Why wouldn't you come. This place has great food, good vibes and nice staff.

name: Snomma Acceber
text: Delicious food, great service.  I will come back!

name: Robert Wallace
text: I'm not a big pizza eater because I can't find anyone near me that serves really good pizza. I'm in Bowling Green,  KY and this is the best pizza I think I've ever eaten. We had the Holy Shitake. Donna was our server and provided excellent service, and she was fun to talk with. We HIGHLY recommend this place.

name: Elizabeth Castor
text: So much fun!  I had the mushrooms pizza and it was DELICIOUS!  So lucky to have gone in on trivia night we had a blast trying to remember all the Disney facts that we could muster.

name: Silas Craine
text: Always good food and a fun atmosphere. I always try to get something different everytime I go! They have a huge selection of craft beer also.

name: Virginia Hanna
text: Had a late lunch at MM today. Great day for patio dining. Our server was great, pizza really good. Very enjoyable experience.

name: Michelle Willi
text: Great service! Awesome food! Neat place,  lots of different kinds of pizza.  Will be back!!

name: Charles Wilkerson
text: This was my first time visiting. I'm not a big fan of brick style pizza due to the burnt flavor of the crust but the toppings were good. I got wings with the hot sauce and the sauce had a vinegary taste but the chicken itself was quite ‚Ä¶More

name: Ash D
text: Loved the environment, the waiters. Just everything. Food was good and prices weren't to bad either.

name: Samuel Hall
text: Very great atmospheric little place, not to mention how fantastic the pizza is. This is the only Mellow Mushroom I‚Äôve been to, so it very well could be normal,but I had to wait almost 2 hours for pizza. This is what brings it down to 3 ‚Ä¶More

name: Lilo Pomerleau
text: Excellent Greek salad.  Good pizza.  Our server was helpful and intuitive.  Beautiful building.

name: Mable Mccoy
text: Great atmosphere! Large menu, lots of choices, big portions. This Family of 5 with some choosy eaters and a dieting-mom had more than enough choices. Our kids ranging in age from 7 to 19 all enjoyed the food and the environment. After a ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Fisher
text: The food was creative and delicious.  The staff was relaxed but not slow. Their pizza crust is very good.  I'd give it more stars but it was too noisy.

name: Throbbin Wood Like To Say
text: Well now, this place is a gem. The food was amazing. Service was great. Prices are wicked good. I can see why a friend of mine makes it to this place when he comes to bowling green every year. By friend I mean some guy I met at the table next to me.

name: DICtater
text: During our travels we had a very hard time finding anywhere with vegan options to eat at. We came across this place and it was totally worth it. The server (mason) we had was very attentive to us being vegan. He went out of his way to make ‚Ä¶More

name: M K
text: Delicious as usual!

name: Scott C
text: Pizza is tasty and good beer selection always on the list of places to go.

name: Caleb Combs
text: The pizza is really good, the service is always amazing, and they almost always have good drink specials going on. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is that is sometimes takes a while on pizza, but it's definitely a good place to grab a meal will some friends.

name: Reshma Khan
text: Heard lot about this place from many people, sowent there. And found pizza was ok I mean it was yummy but not extremely tasty as people said. May be my taste is little different thus felt it was overrated.

name: Metta Devine-Qin
text: Love the vibes and how every mellow mushroom is different! The bruschetta is my favorite appetizer! Love coming here with friends and the selection of beers is top notch.

name: Eddie Maddox
text: I like the Melliw Mushroom chain a lot. The pizza here was nearly burned so we did not enjoy it as much as other locations. I will try again in the future and update review if the results are better.

name: Korenna Bishop
text: Good pizza, a bit pricey but pretty good.

name: Kathy Schrader
text: The food was pretty good today but the service was not as good as usual. After our pizza was delivered to the table and I had to ask twice for plates. I do understand that it was Mother's Day and they were busy but plates are something that ‚Ä¶More

name: James K
text:
I mean, it's Mellow Mushroom.

If you want a good, solid pizza in a quirky atmosphere it's the place to be. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Morgan
text: Dont have a party there service takes forever and not everyone's food comes out at the same time and the food is subpar

name: Appalachia Wholesale
text: Great atmosphere and best sangria in town

name: Darrin Hardin
text: Great wait staff, roomy atmosphere, great turn around time on appatizers and then the huge pizzas. Very good choice.

name: Charlene Tillery
text: Awesome thin pizza crust, need more salad selections bearded pizza Baker needs to keep beard covered while baking!!!

name: Gina Chambers
text: Love, love, love this restaurant. Great pizza, many taps to choose from, friendly staff. Fun casual atmosphere. I'll go back again and again.

name: Phillip Hogan
text: Pricey drinks but trivia night is fun

name: Sherry Ausbrooks
text: Mellow Mushroom is one of those chill places. The atmosphere is chill. The food is delicious. Especially the pizza!!!! Sometimes they even have live bands. Just a great place to eat, hang out, and even have a couple drinks.

name: Richard Keith Sr
text: Great food, great service and great atmosphere!

name: Chella Bhagyam
text: Great lunch deal. Bowl of soup and slice if pizza for under $10. I honestly was satisfied after just the soup!

name: Anya DeLaura
text: Love the Mellow Mushroom!  They have great pizza and a fabulous beer selection!  We recommend the Great White Pizza!  Funky 60s art and an electric atmosphere make it fun and even family friendly.

name: Rich Lambert
text: Great food, even better beer choices, service was really on.

name: Ross Everhard
text: A little expensive for what you get.  The food was good, the service a little slow.

name: Ev C23
text: Great Pizza, Drinks and Atmosphere

name: Lawrence Washington
text: Not the cleanest location,  and a bit sob sub par for mellow mushroom locations.

name: Sherrie Davis
text: Food and service were great.

name: Janet Martin
text: Good Pizza, Slow Service

name: Chris Stangel
text: Food was cold , but the staff was friendly and very helpful

name: ÍßÅ‡º∫‚Ä¢NexìÜâ‚Ä¢‡ºªÍßÇ
text: The atmosphere is great! My family and I had a great time there. Our waiter Austin was great! We will definately be going back.

name: G ball
text: Medium House Special pizza (considered a supreme at some pizza places). Meats, vegetables and black olives. Salted pretzels (3), with yellow mustard. All really good! Coke products (prefer Pepsi).

name: Chris Grinstead
text: Always the best pizza in town quality is always the same very consistent and good.  The ingredients are very good and you can  tell that they are not coming out of a can or Frozen

name: Angie Mckinley
text: Our waiter was plain awesome! Our food was great. Nice & very clean place. Employees very kind!

name: Drinkymcwater
text: Fantastic place to check out if you want good food. The customer service is great, and the atmosphere is humble and inviting! Definitely will stop by again, five stars from me.

name: Eric Hiltner
text: Food was pretty good. Nice environment and some good music being played.

name: Ramon Medina
text: Great pizza!

name: Mandy
text: Really good pizza, and unique types of pizza as well. The dessert was beautifully made. I live the atmosphere, the aesthetic inside. I like the stage where they have local bands and live music. There's a bar inside too. I love all the sculptures and other art inside and outside.

name: Burke Kaplan
text: Amazing food and service

name: Maddox Alexander
text: Mellow Mushroom was okay in my experience. Mushrooms on my pizza tasted a little funny. Don't really remember much after that. Still recommend it  though to anyone looking for great pizza.

name: Alexandrea Crackel
text: This place is fantastic. Great beer list, amazing cocktails. I had the drink with elderflower liqueur. We had the pretzel bites, the buffalo chicken pizza and the pesto pizza. All wonderful. If we didn‚Äôt live in Chicago we would be regulars.

name: TONY
text: The food was okay (not great just okay), but the wait was long (hardly anyone there) and the price was insane. I can get an okay pizza for $5-6 at little ceasar's and def not $11 wow outrageously priced!

name: Alan
text: Love this pizza restaurant has a rock vibe inside which I love! Lots of selection in the menu and great staff!

name: Bircan Sayar
text: The vibe and the cuisine are awesome. Choice of music and waiters/waitresses need progress.

name: Trinity Luna
text: Great service

name: everaldo sierra
text: Very very good

name: Bonnie Will
text: Went in for lunch, I ordered a small pizza. It came out in a timely manner, hot and very good. My server, Riley, was very nice and attentive.

name: Vicki Kaltenthaler
text: Always great to visit here when visiting Bowling Green. Food was good and served quickly.

name: Angela Miller
text: Atmosphere and food are amazing!

name: Holly Gonzalez
text: I come here almost every month and my experience has ALWAYS been great but last week me and my fianc√© came in and ordered the pepperoni cheese bread (Which was good) but when we got our pizza it was burnt REALLY bad. I assume they got a new ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Phipps
text: Staff is very friendly and helpful. Always on cue and task. Very classy place and autmosphere.  Awesome pizza and subs. Always looks fantastic and smells awesome. Must give props where they belong, Doordasher driver. Thanks for the help. Keep up the awesome work.....

name: Cyndi Crocker
text: Great atmosphere. Great pizza. Nice people.

name: Kassidy Edwards
text: I enjoy the food here, but sometimes the service can be a bit slow. I had my family come there one day for lunch and they weren‚Äôt impressed. My mom ordered a sandwich and said it has no flavor whatsoever. Giving 3 stars though cause I love the atmosphere and the workers are pretty nice.

name: Brigid Sowders
text: Mellow Mushroom is always great! Love everything on the menu!

name: Ivar Heredia
text: I always enjoy anything that I have here. Plenty of tasty options for vegetarians like me, and several gluten free options for those interested. They always have something interesting to try in their beers selection on tap and Thursday you ‚Ä¶More

name: Alistair Funge
text: Great pizza and friendly staff. Can be a little bit noisy, but it's a pizza place, so enjoy.

name: Stephen King
text: Service is volatile, sometimes great other times horrible. We have always had decent service during lunch and early dinner. Arriving within an hour or so of closing, from our experience, is not recommended; during this time we have never ‚Ä¶More

name: Heath Hatcher
text: Chain pizza is seldom my favorite but we really enjoyed this first meal back from the hinterlands.

name: Danielle Zaradich
text: Excellent service, fun atmosphere, very clean, and the food is delicious. They are very accommodating to large groups and even when they are busy, we never wait long for our pizza. It's our favorite place for good pizza.

name: Taylor Funk
text: The atmosphere was great staff was friendly environment was clean and food was served classy but affordable

name: Louise Faulkner
text: Good food and good service!

name: Gracie D
text: Super slow. Over an hour to get our food delivered to our table

name: Nicholas Ross
text: The food is always good, but the wait was very long for only a few table seatings for the time I was there.  Really felt like they wanted to push the somewhat overpriced pints of beer before your food comes out.  Other than that, staff is very friendly and our waitress really knew her stuff on the three (3) different menus.

name: Jeff Winters
text: Great place. Good food and service. Sat out on the patio in the sunshine on the first day of Spring.

name: Johanna De Jesus
text: I love mellow mushroom! Every time i travel i will eat at one and taste the local recipes! Like always great service and delicious food our waitress Donna was exceptional extremely servicial! I will recommend this place anytime!

name: Christi Winkler
text:
BESTEST PIZZA I ever ate
Love that you can something other than yucky plain tomato sauce, also gluten free if you want that, great beer on tap selection, wine I think also you won't go away hungry if you eat here.

name: Austin Bitting
text: Really good pizza! their crust is great!

name: Ryan Davis
text: Fantastic wait staff, amazing pizzas and a great atmosphere.  The bar keeps a giant selection of bottles, cans, and taps of a surprising variety of beers.  The kitchen pops out unique pizzas topped with a smorgasbord of fresh toppings, and ‚Ä¶More

name: Cheri Kaplan
text: we love it

name: Warsign01
text: Slow service, good food.

name: Tony Ryherd
text: The building once was a lawnmower repair and retail space. They kept the garage doors which is perfect for nice weather dining. Staff is always friendly and helpful. Awesome beer selection. Definitely has a corporate feel as of late. Which cuts into the fun of the original idea of the mellow mushroom.

name: M Flack
text: Wonderful pizza and they have many non pizza items on the menu.   Good attentive staff will take great care of your needs.  Pesto pizza was too notch.  Even down to the crust...golden brown and clean ovens were apparent.   This place rocks. ‚Ä¶More

name: M Miller
text: This place has a really cool vibe. Went with a large group of friends and our server was very friendly and accomodating. Pizza took FOREVER to arrive but it was a busy Saturday night. They have a lot of fun specialty pizzas--try them all.

name: Sheila Sutton
text: Great food & service

name: chad patterson
text: Absolutely the best pizza we have had!! Atmosphere was just as great and our waitress was wonderful!!!!!

name: Don Disterheft
text: Great place to eat, the best pizza, really cool ambience,  staff is always great.

name: Chris Grinstead
text: Pizza always in point and fresh.  Excellent ingredients

name: Khryx Davis
text: Always enjoy mellow mushroom.  Great for outings with family and friends.

name: Jeffrey Handley
text: Delicious food and friendly and helpful staff.

name: Inna Bezhenar
text: Food is always amazing, so is service. They have wonderful atmosphere and choices for vegetarians as well.

name: Scott Cleveland
text: Great food and great service. Everyone was friendly and happy to see us. Recommend to everyone. Best pizza and wings I ever had.

name: EJ Fields
text: Every Mellow Mushroom I go to does not disappoint. Great pizza at a fair price. The vibe in each one is different, with varying decor. It's also close to campus, which is nice.

name: Danice Metz
text: Great food and friendly staff

name: Skylar Wooden
text: I love their build-your-own salads. Their bbq tempeh is also really good if you're looking for a meat substitute.

name: Christina S.
text: Great pizza, great vegetarian options! The outdoor dining area is great!

name: Caleb May
text: I always have a great time at Mellow Mushroom.  The service is great, the food is awesome, and the environment is fantastic!

name: Katie Hudson
text: Not vegan friendly. You have to pay for cheese, even if you don't get it, then each veggie is $3 each. Just go to Blaze, is better pizza anyway.

name: Austin S
text: Always a pleasure visiting Mellow Mushroom. Best pizza in the south.

name: Richard Novy
text: Great food! Beer cheese pretzels are awesome!

name: Larry Fudge
text: Great selection of beers. I had the Melloterian stromboli and it was excellent. Definitely will come again.

name: Kathy Byrd
text: Awsome pizzas great beer

name: Jake Wisdom
text: Food and drinks were delicious with great service. Took a little long, but it was busy so I understand

name: meghen mckinley
text: Always enjoy Mellow, and consistent in a good way. Have ordered in restaurant as well as for pick up. Staff is always very helpful and friendly! One of our staples for drinks and food in BG.

name: Julie Ratliff
text: Took forever to get our food. However the pizza is always very good. The build your own salad is a bit of a rip off at one dollar per item. Don't get much of any item. Lots of lettuce mainly.

name: Barry Heizer
text:
Good service even when our waitress had to serve another (very large) party at the same time.
Food was excellent (we had a Loaded Potato Pie,  local store only), at a reasonable price.

name: Doug Byers
text: Good food, excellent staff

name: Rob Morrow
text: All mellow mushrooms are great!!!

name: Kathryn Shambre
text: Fun decor, yummy food,  awesome beer list!

name: Greg Telles
text: Wonderful atmosphere and great pizza! Very friendly staff.

name: Tonya Gabhart
text: I really like this restaurant. Ive only been twice but food is always good.

name: Joshua Henderson
text: Had an excellent calzone. Great beer selection. Great atmosphere. Cynthia is the best bartender in town.

name: Erin Greunke
text: One of the best places to eat in Bowling Green, in my opinion, especially if you have special dietary needs. My mom has to stick to the AIP foods list, and we were able to find plenty of options.  Same if you are a vegetarian. Good vibe. Friendly Staff. And, a healthy craft beer list.

name: Greg DeLoach
text: Love this place. Great food and service.

name: Achunga Amury
text: Good

name: andrea haury
text: Great environment there was live music on this Thursday night. Took forever to get my order due to some mess up in the kitchen ended up taking it to go and I still paid full price....I feel there should have been a discount...like half off? ‚Ä¶More

name: aj
text: Everything was delicious

name: Shelley Hickman
text: Every thing was delicious and our server was phenomenal!

name: Tommy Allen
text: One of the better mellow mushrooms I've been too in the Union. Service was a bit slow, but food was good as per usual with the chain.

name: Devan Parker
text: Best pretzel bites and calzones in town!!!

name: Rutuja Chinchankar
text: Suppper food! Try the hummus dish...you'll love it

name: Andy Linss
text: Fun place with good atmosphere.  Food is good, not great. Service is the same.

name: G Duvall
text: They accommodated a large group easily. They are pretty mellow here.

name: Justin Parrish
text: Great selections of beer and pizza. Beer cheese is the stuff

name: Kyle Lewis
text: Love the decor and service was great!

name: Prabha Manda
text: We had the holy shiitake pizza and it was great, had freshly grated parmesan and a little bit of truffle oil on it!!!

name: Jamie Bradford
text: The service could use some improvements, but the food was yummy

name: Kelly Juarbe
text: Used to love to go here they do have excellent pizza! If the crust isn't doughy in the middle ....

name: Ryan Hughes
text: Best pizza I've ever had. Great beer selection and incredible staff. I always leave here full and happy.

name: Nickolas Moerman
text: Always great food and excellent service.

name: Cassondra Lashley
text: Food to satisfy all taste buds. Mellow environment and good music (when live). All in all, never a bad experience!üëçüèº

name: Jessica Culpepper
text: Always a treat to eat at Mellow Mushroom! My favorite pizza crust out of any I've ever eaten.  This location is a bit newer/nicer, service was great, and food came fast. Definitely must try if you've never eaten here before.

name: Greg Koszut
